strapiPost.title: Walmart Announces Open Call For Products
strapiPost.content:
Applications are open for Walmart’s annual Open Call and will be accepted through April 8, making it the first time the program has offered early access to apply. 

  • A national investment: As Walmart has a 10-year commitment to invest $350b in American jobs, the Open Call is Walmart’s largest sourcing event for U.S. made or grown products to go on the retailer’s shelves. 
  • A seat at the table: The event is slated for June 28-29 where selected applicants will have one-on-one 30min product pitch meetings. Additionally, there will be breakout sessions where leaders and special guests will provide suppliers with additional resources and insights. 

Click HERE for more information.
